price: [در آن هنگام] نه می‌توانند [به کسی] وصیت کنند و نه به سوی خانوادۀ خود بازگردند.
arabic: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falā yastaṭīʿūna tawṣiyatan walā ilā ahlihim yarjiʿūna
